title: Bald

adjectives: A person who is naturally without hair on their head.
verbs: To be without hair on one's head.
nouns: A person characterized by a lack of hair.

description: A person without hair on their head, representing a distinct physical trait. It can be used to refer to oneself or others, or in a playful or humorous context.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the bald emoji features a smooth, rounded head with a soft, realistic sheen that suggests a gentle texture.  The absence of hair is depicted with clean lines and subtle shading, conveying a sense of simplicity and maturity.  This emoji can represent someone who is bald, or it can be used metaphorically to signify a fresh start or a clean slate in digital conversations.
